column5: Getting closer to takeoff. Is there a good bait shop in either of these two towns? Mainly would like a flat of crawlers... Thanks ahead!
We always stop at Rainy Lake One Stop in Int. Falls. I've never been to Baudette, but there is a place called Log Cabin Bait & Tackle there too.

I know that "Outdoors Again" is a bait/tackle shop in Baudette does sell flats of crawlers for transport to Canada. They are right next to Alice's Family Restaurant which is the old "Ranch House". On the Rainy side, I have no idea. Have a great trip, only a week or so to go for us!
You could try lucky bait just east of Baudette on HWY 11 on your way into town if you are coming from that way.Rainy River is not an option.
Thank You... saw it on Google, We will give it a try!
